cause.description:
We support a global warming excise tax to be imposed on all private vehicles with an EPA average fuel economy below 20 miles per gallon.
1. SUV owners emit a disproportionate share of carbon and other greenhouse gases.
2. Being rich doesn't give one a right to despoil the global commons.
3. A federal tax can be used to discourage SUV use and generate funds for carbon offsets and alternative energy.
cause.mission: hold gas guzzlers accountable for their ecological footprint
cause.name: Make SUV Owners Pay
